about.description: I am currently developing Front-End responsive websites, my goal is to continue honing my knowledge and skills to accomplish my current dream, turning into Software Engineer.
about.description2: I love crafting friendly styled UI apps

projects.title: My Projects
projects.presentation: I am currently developing several projects, each one with different technologies!, They will be available soon!
projects.app1description: One of my first responsive apps, user can enter text and convert it at will.
projects.app2description: A movie website, project Built with React, uses Axios for routing, query-string for requests, and Swiper for swipe effects

contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.description: Have a project in mind?, Looking to partner or work together?, Reach out through the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
